title: Wupatki National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger      Junior Rangers Children can stop by the Wupatki Visitor Center and ask for a copy of our Junior Ranger booklet, or see one here. A minimum of 1 1/2 hours is needed to complete the Wupatki Trail, read the exhibits and answer the questions in the booklet.
